definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
the tiles are broken, the walls dilapidated
see 殘垣斷壁|残垣断壁[can2 yuan2 duan4 bi4]

sentences.english: Ivy had crept over the ruined castle walls.
sentences.chinese: 常春藤已爬滿了那荒堡殘垣。

sentences.english: With the ruins of terror’s triumph children build their doll’s house.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們以可怖的勝利之殘垣爲他們的玩偶建造房屋。

sentences.english: We found a perch on the ruins of a low stone wall.
sentences.chinese: 我們找到一處矮石牆的殘垣，歇了歇腳。
